tokens.resolved_gloss: to call out to (i.e. properly, address by name, but used in a wide variety of applications)

tokens.resolved_gloss: a day (as the warm hours), whether literal (from sunrise to sunset, or from one sunset to the next), or figurative (a space of time defined by an associated term), (often used adverb)

tokens.resolved_gloss: tightness (i.e. figuratively, trouble); transitively, a female rival

tokens.resolved_gloss: to pull off; hence (intensively) to strip, (reflex.) to depart; by implication, to deliver, equip (for fight); present, strengthen
tokens.translation: to pull off; hence (intensively) to strip, (reflex.) to depart; by implication, to deliver, equip (for fight); present, strengthen

tokens.resolved_gloss: to be heavy, i.e. in a bad sense (burdensome, severe, dull) or in a good sense (numerous, rich, honorable); causatively, to make weighty (in the same two senses)
